text: Lophiotoma is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Lophiotoma include: * Lophiotoma abbreviata (Reeve, 1843) * Lophiotoma acuta (Perry, 1811) * Lophiotoma albina (Lamarck, 1822) * Lophiotoma babylonia (Linnaeus, 1758) * Lophiotoma bisaya Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma brevicaudata * Lophiotoma capricornica Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma cerithiformis : synonym of Daphnella lirata (Reeve, 1845) * Lophiotoma cingulifera (Lamarck, 1822): synonym of Iotyrris cingulifera (Lamarck, 1822) * Lophiotoma dickkilburni Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma friedrichbonhoefferi Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma indica (Röding, 1798) * Lophiotoma madagascarensis Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma notata (Sowerby III, 1889) * Lophiotoma olangoensis Olivera, 2002 * Lophiotoma panglaoensis Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma pseudoannulata Dell, 1990 * Lophiotoma pseudocosmoi Baoquan Li & Xinzheng Li, 2008 * Lophiotoma ruthveniana (Melvill, 1923) * Lophiotoma tayabasensis Olivera, 2004 * Lophiotoma tigrina Lamarck * Lophiotoma verticala Baoquan Li & Xinzheng Li, 2008 * Lophiotoma vezzaroi Cossignani, 2015 ==References== Category:Turridae Category:Taxa named by Thomas Lincoln Casey Jr.
title: Lophiotoma
